title: Solving Multi-Agent Target Assignment and Path Finding with a Single Constraint Tree. (arXiv:2307.00663v2 [cs.AI] UPDATED)
abstract: Combined Target-Assignment and Path-Finding problem (TAPF) requires simultaneously assigning targets to agents and planning collision-free paths for agents from their start locations to their assigned targets. As a leading approach to address TAPF, Conflict-Based Search with Target Assignment (CBS-TA) leverages both K-best target assignments to create multiple search trees and Conflict-Based Search (CBS) to resolve collisions in each search tree. While being able to find an optimal solution, CBS-TA suffers from scalability due to the duplicated collision resolution in multiple trees and the expensive computation of K-best assignments. We therefore develop Incremental Target Assignment CBS (ITA-CBS) to bypass these two computational bottlenecks. ITA-CBS generates only a single search tree and avoids computing K-best assignments by incrementally computing new 1-best assignments during the search. translated_title: 用单一约束树解决多智能体目标分配和路径规划问题
translated_abstract: 组合目标分配和路径规划问题（TAPF）要求同时为智能体分配目标并为其规划从起始位置到目标位置的无碰撞路径。作为解决TAPF问题的主要方法，基于冲突搜索与目标分配（CBS-TA）利用K最佳目标分配创建多个搜索树，并利用冲突基础搜索（CBS）解决每个搜索树中的碰撞问题。尽管能够找到最优解，但由于在多个树中重复解决碰撞问题和计算高昂的K最佳分配，CBS-TA在可扩展性方面存在问题。因此，我们开发了增量目标分配CBS（ITA-CBS）来解决这两个计算瓶颈。ITA-CBS只生成单个搜索树，并在搜索过程中通过逐步计算新的最佳分配来避免计算K最佳分配。理论上，我们证明ITA-CBS能够保证找到最优解，并在实践中进行了验证。
tldr: 本研究提出了增量目标分配CBS（ITA-CBS）算法，通过生成单个搜索树并避免计算K最佳分配来解决多智能体目标分配和路径规划问题的可扩展性和计算效率的问题。
en_tdlr: This paper proposes an Incremental Target Assignment CBS (ITA-CBS) algorithm to address the scalability and computational efficiency issues in multi-agent target assignment and path finding problems by generating a single search tree and avoiding the computation of K-best assignments.
